name: water-compaction

effect.sun-moon: Raises this Pokémon's Defense by two stages when it's hit by a Water move.

effect.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee: Raises this Pokémon's Defense by two stages when it's hit by a Water move.

short_effect: Raises this Pokémon's Defense by two stages when it's hit by a Water move.
